fields.description:
Currently ELBs create one ASG regardless of single or multiple available zones configured with it. Then it uses desired capacity in an attempt to distribute servo instances to multi-zones (e.g., desired capacity of 2 = 1 VM per each zone). 
It causes weird situations when a zone run out of resources or becomes unavailable. EUCA-11209 is another example of weirdness. 

Rather than relying on ASG for distributing and balancing servo instances across zones, ELBs should create an ASG per AZ.
fields.summary: ELB should create ASG per AZ

comments.body: Thorough QA and upgrade case are the biggest concerns with introducing this late in the dev cycle.
Upgrade issue is being tracked in EUCA-11290.

Confirmed that for every availability zone defined for ELB, autoscaling group was created.

Eucalyptus Version: {{4.2.0-0.0.23890.654.20150918git84e694a.el6}}

*Steps*

# Deployed Eucalyptus 4.2 cloud with 3 AZs (clusters) - [hspencer-1321|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Master/1321/]
# Created 'devops' account
# Added access and secret keys for 'devops/admin' user
# Created six ELBs:
{code}
[root@c-02 ~]# eulb-create-lb -z one -l "lb-port=80, protocol=HTTP, instance-port=80, instance-protocol=HTTP" ELB-Zone1 --region devops-admin@region-1
DNS_NAME	ELB-Zone1-000693176866.lb.c-02.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
[root@c-02 ~]# eulb-create-lb -z two -l "lb-port=80, protocol=HTTP, instance-port=80, instance-protocol=HTTP" ELB-Zone2 --region devops-admin@region-1
DNS_NAME	ELB-Zone2-000693176866.lb.c-02.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
[root@c-02 ~]# eulb-create-lb -z three -l "lb-port=80, protocol=HTTP, instance-port=80, instance-protocol=HTTP" ELB-Zone3 --region devops-admin@region-1
DNS_NAME	ELB-Zone3-000693176866.lb.c-02.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
[root@c-02 ~]# eulb-create-lb -z one,two -l "lb-port=80, protocol=HTTP, instance-port=80, instance-protocol=HTTP" ELB-Zone12 --region devops-admin@region-1
DNS_NAME	ELB-Zone12-000693176866.lb.c-02.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
[root@c-02 ~]# eulb-create-lb -z one,three -l "lb-port=80, protocol=HTTP, instance-port=80, instance-protocol=HTTP" ELB-Zone13 --region devops-admin@region-1
DNS_NAME	ELB-Zone13-000693176866.lb.c-02.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
[root@c-02 ~]# eulb-create-lb -z one,two,three -l "lb-port=80, protocol=HTTP, instance-port=80, instance-protocol=HTTP" ELB-Zone123 --region devops-admin@region-1
DNS_NAME	ELB-Zone123-000693176866.lb.c-02.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com

[root@c-02 ~]# eulb-describe-lbs --region devops-admin@region-1
LOAD_BALANCER	ELB-Zone13	ELB-Zone13-000693176866.lb.c-02.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	2015-09-20T15:05:19.015Z	internet-facing

LOAD_BALANCER	ELB-Zone1	ELB-Zone1-000693176866.lb.c-02.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	2015-09-20T15:04:04.076Z	internet-facing
LOAD_BALANCER	ELB-Zone123	ELB-Zone123-000693176866.lb.c-02.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	2015-09-20T15:05:36.17Z	internet-facing
